attributes.action: WHY DO THE MOD STOP COMFORT BOXES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
WE HAVE READ THAT THE MOD HAS TOLD IT'S OFFICERS NOT TO GIVE NAMES TO PEOPLE WHO SEND OUR TROOPS COMFORT BOXES
IN THE FRONT LINE BECAUSE THEY HAVE NOT GOT ENOUGH PLANES AND CHOPPERS IN AFGHANISTAN TO TAKE THE BOXES TO THE SOLDIERS IN THE FRONT LINE. WE HAVE GOT LETTERS FROM THE LADS TO SAY HOW MUCH THEY LOOK FORWARD TO THEM.OLNY FAMILIES  ARE ALLOWED TO SEND THEM.WHAT ABOUT THE LADS WHO HAVE NO FAMILY.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
